results.name: My Personal Homepage
results.description:
This is my personal website.
* Responsive Web Design
* Get data from another HTML page and insert it into the displayed page by AJAX.
* Insert the data from JSON into the displayed page by AJAX.
* Make an intro animation by Javascript.
Thank you for viewing my website !

results.name: HTML/CSS/RWD Practice
results.description: This practice is based on the website of Asus (Taiwan-based multinational computer and phone hardware and electronics company). Improving my HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills. Much more details of the process and the problems I dealt with are in my blog.

results.name: Multiple Users
results.description: Getting data from an API , and displaying it in HTML. To make the data much easier to read, I used CSS and JS to hide part of information until the users open it.
